subject: RE: [junit] JUnit, ORBacus, ClassLoader
msgSnippet: A little more info would be nice.  Which UI are you using that supports the checkbox you mention? -Jason
messageBody:
A little more info would be nice. Which UI are you using that supports the
checkbox you mention?

-Jason

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Al Sjogren [mailto:asjogren@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2001 1:52 AM
> To: JUnit ListServer
> Subject: [junit] JUnit, ORBacus, ClassLoader
>
>
> When I uncheck "Reload Classes every run" my tests work
> correctly. If
> not
> I get the Java ORB instead of the ORBacus ORB causing a
> ClassCastException.
>
> Why?
>
> I have a circumvention now. I'm just curious.
>
> Al Sjogren
> Seattle
